post.body: LOL, Arrggghhhh! dialup, yuck
i'm no love doctor, but are you sure you're over it?
think i just found them by google'ing both their names, his is too common. left message with my cell number. hope it's them.
true, i've been in it since the early nineties
he doesn't have a web presence, works a lot. he does read my blog sometimes. think that helps. I'm glad he's concerned, though
a friend said she's catholic & doesn't believe in divorce. she'll just kill him. sadly, we lost touch with them. hmmm
lol. i don't flirt and no one flirts with me. what is his problem? i ain't hiding anything. he has my passwords
at least with a video game you can turn it off when you want
lol, you getting the same harassment too?
told him our married friends need to stop getting divorced
call Ken Nugent?
understand fully and you can always claim in court you had flashbacks of him attacking you.
hey cuz, flashbacks can drive you crazy. sending good vibes your way to ease the swelling and pain
nite
I'l get a pic to you when i'm back on pc
no, no pics of fam. Not ready for that yet
I know
you so fresh
a harem to work your farm?
Have a blessed and safe holiday
i'm your friend too. i'm not friends with all my cousins
Merry Christmas my NY cuz
Happy Holidays
you have friends, Merry Christmas
oh I plan to
getting ready soon to bring Christmas in with Love
yes all was done in three minutes
just stuffed all son's stuff in a large Santa Bag. You gave me the idea. He's going to flip
i'm hiding son's gifts in my trunk.
Morning! I goofed. Goodie day 2day, thought it was on Thur. Making a run 2 kroger 2 get stuff for meatballs. Some1 bringing n crockpot 4 me
BRB, have to actually work
just found out my old team wants me back to help with some testing. will they ever let go? it's been almost a yr since i changed teams
Seems everytime I hear talk about my ancestors, there's another case of mental illness resulting in domestic violence. Should I tell Hubby?
Hubby said I need to find more married friends. LOL
Some cool cars and trucks down here
Afternoon twitters! I'm downtown Macon waiting on Christmas Parade 2 start. Son on school float. He was 13 of top 15 in fundraiser sales.
Time 4 me 2 signoff. Santa will be arriving soon and I need 2 get tucked into bed. Merry Christmas to all and to all a blessed night.
Hubby made me daquiris. Surprised i'm still typing.
Hubby and I watching movies all evening. His 1st Christmas Eve home in 4 years. He's been smiling ever since I came home from work.
My Christmas present. Hubby does not have to work tonight!
